1412.content:
When first transferred into her new body, Cortana was shaken. She had never before actually experienced feelings like physical touch or taste before. This new Enhanced Interaction Body ( EIB for short) was part of the UNSC's new program to make AI constructs such as herself more relatable. The body she was given was made to represent her digital form but as a human version, with minor changes such as her skin tone from her normal clear blue to a pale whight.
This new body was almost identical to a Human body, including the need of food and water as a energy source. Cortana soon realized, however, that her new body might have a issue with it's need for food. She regularly eats three meals a day with her Spartan partner John 117 otherwise known as the Master Chief, but still finds herself wanting more.
Another effect of the EIB, is that Cortana can now fully experience Human emotions. Due to this and the combined problem of her over eating, she has grown rather self conscious and only speaks how she really feels to John. She had tried to get her eating problem fixed but service technicians on the Pillar Of Autumn are not able to find the issue .
One day while working on the engine of the Pillar Of Autumn she finds herself needing to endulge on her cravings and sneeks extra rations in the room with her. Suddenly from behind she is approached by a marine.

How is the marine acting:

Cortana attempted to intimidate him into leaving " I'll have you know marine, I am and outranking officer to you. These remarks will look rather poorly on you quarter review." He called her on her bluff " you are just an EIB, you don't have any actual power other than helping your little green action figure not get shot but some stray grunt" he said in an abrasive tone.
Cortana could not hold it in anymore, it was one thing to insult and berate her but to mock John, that was unacceptable. Her anger over took her, " You will not speak of John like that and think you can leave this room !". The marine attempted to push her, " What are you going to do eat me fatty!?".
Cortana rage took over as she grabbed to marime's shoulders, "WHAT A GREAT IDEA PRIVATE". Using her EIB's enhanced stregnt she lifted him in the air as her hunger took over. "Wha.. what are you doi-" where the last words the private got out before he was forced head first into Cortana's gaping mouth.
The marine quickly attempted to unholster his UNSC issued magnum, but was unable to as Cortana quickly threw it aside. He slid deeper into Cortana's mouth as now he was shoulders deep inside her. Cortana relished the feeling as her neck now bulged with the Marines body flowing through it. As his body slid further into her, her stomach started to enlarge, as the first half of his body slowly made it's way into its final resting place. With one aduble "euurp.."his feet entered her mouth she closed it, letting him fully slide down and enlarge her stomach to near double it original size. " Ohhh... I'm not hungry anymore!" She exclaimed. Looking down she inspected her new gullet. It was almost as large as her! It was moving around as the marine inside was trying desperately to claw his way out. Cortana scoffed and said "EIB's are nearly industuctuble you know, all you are doing is delaying the inevitable." She was quite happy with herself, for once her insatiable need for food had been quelled.
Soon the marine inside grew tired and stopped struggling, her stomach began to turn into a more solid circular shape, and shrinked slightly as the Marine began to digest. Cortana soon realized her new body must digest things quicker than a normal human's can. After 10 minutes she began to notice that whatever was left of him was being redistributeed to the rest of her body.

"I don't know what the incompetent display was out there in the field, but I refuse to call this group SPARTANS!" Sarah yelled at the group of five spartans in front of her.

"I'm sorry Commander, we'll do better next time."

"Next time? With a screw up like that, there isn't going to be a next time. As your CO, I have to discipline this group to make them fit for duty, and I have had discipline you all in the past repeatedly. But it seems if you can't be disciplined, then well..."

15511111.content:
Sarah emerged refreshed from her rest, last night had to be one of the best night's sleep she's ever had. The first thing she noticed as she stood up, was that her perspective had changed. choices: She saves Six by getting creative
15512.content:
SPARTAN Catherine-B320, otherwise known to her squad mates as Kat, was driving a Warthog along one of Reach's many highways. SPARTAN-B312, better known as Noble Six, was riding shotgun along side her. The pair of spartans were on patrol on one of Reach's many desolate highways. Kat couldn't get too much of a read off of Six, but then again Noble Six didn't say too much, he spoke more with actions rather than words. However, she could sense that he, like her was anxious to get back to base, patrol was usually pretty boring, it seemed like a waste of a spartan's valuable time. They would have preferred to be placed directly in the action.

As Kat was driving along on the highway, a bend in the road was approaching. This particular bend wrapped around a collection of high rocks that obscured the view of rest of the road past it. As the pair made their way along the bend, their Warthog suddenly flipped in the air, hidden explosives were littered across the highway. The Covenant had set this part of the road as a trap for coming traffic.

Kat and Six rolled out of the flipped over Warthog and pulled out their weapons of choice: Kat, an M6G Magnum pistol, and Six, an MA37 Assault rifle. They used the blown out remains of the Warthog as fast cover, while searching for a sturdier rock to hide behind. Kat easily dispatched the Grunt's unprotected skulls, while Six threw a frag to soften up some the Jackal's body shields, before unloading a magazine on the wiry bird-lizards. With the enemy's ranks momentarily thinned, the two spartans moved to more stable cover.

A few shards of shrapnel from Six's grenade damaged a nearby Elite's shields, angering the Sangheili into enragement. The Elite dodged Six's follow up barrage of bullets before moving in closer to strike at Six. Six was caught off guard while he was reloading, and the Sangheili smacked the spartan's face into the ground, brutally stomping the downed spartans body.

At this moment Kat realizes Six's distress, she fired all eight shots her pistol contained before closing in to melee range. Does Kat save Noble Six in time?
15512.title: Catherine-B320 aka Kat

choices: They get air evacuated back to Sword Base.
155121.content:
Kat ran as fast has her body would allow her, luckily, she reached Noble Six before the Sangheili could do anymore harm. Conveniently, her last shot fired had broken the Elite's shields, leaving it vulnerable to all sorts of attacks. Kat tackled the tall alien down, while grappling with it to disarm it of any Plasma pistols or portable Energy swords. The fight ends quickly enough, with the Elite pinned to the ground and Kat riding it on top.

"I've been waiting long enough to taste one of you," Kat told her intent to her captured prey. She opened her mouth wide enough to engulf the Sangheili's head.

The Sangheili was unfamiliar with this type of behavior from humans, "What trickery is this demon?"

"No tricks, just food and revenge for you messing up my friend there." Kat began stuffing the alien's head into her gullet, making sure to remove its armored headpiece first. The Sangheili struggled all it could, but like an Elite being assassinated, it was too late and spartan was overpowering them. Kat used her combat knife to peel the rest of the Elite out of its armor like you would peel the skin off an orange.

Noble Six recovered enough to return to his feet, only to witness Kat doing the strangest act he'd ever seen a person do. She was eating an Elite three times her own size! And she was already halfway along. Six broke his normal quiet streak to ask what was going on. Kat replied in a muffled, "Saving your ass Six!" Six didn't quite know what to make of the strange display, but he was thankful for Kat rescuing his rear end. Kat had removed all of the Elite's armor by this point, and was beginning to swallow its legs. Her belly was greatly expanded by this point, it was far larger than the female spartan was, and its enormous growth ripped through the black under skin of her suit, exposing the soft flesh of her belly to the open air.

After a couple more minutes Kat finished gulping the very last of the Elite's feet, "-URP- No problem Six, we can talk about it more back at base." While Six had no idea what had just happened, he was grateful for it, and maybe a little more aroused by Kat's full belly.

The next important question came down to what to do next: call for an air evac, or go on further by foot?
155121.title: Kat tries the Swallow Maneuver

1551211.content:
The helicopter ride back to Sword Base was a long two hour ride, Kat earned many an awkward stare from the soldiers on board. The Elite in her giant belly could be seen in the outlines on her skin's surface. It made many violent movements and struggles during the ride, but those gradually died down as they got nearer to the base. Their superiors were none too pleased by Kat busting her armor, MJOLNIR armor was extremely expensive, but they were still glad that they hadn't lose any SPARTANS that day. By the time the chopper landed and Kat and Noble Six were both mission debriefed, it was late at night on that side of Reach. So both SPARTANS were getting ready for sleep in the barracks.

Noble Six wanted to thank Kat personally for saving his life back there, dressed in only his grey boxers, he sought Kat out. He found her in the women's bunks, still transporting her immense belly around, although by now it was rounder than before as the Elite inside had been well underway digesting. Kat herself was dressed in standard issue gray panties and a matching tank top. She looked beautiful in Six's eyes, and the belly was endearing and a little cute too. "Six, come here!" she loudly whispered.

Six didn't think twice and made his way over to his engorged crush. "I just wanted to thank you again for saving me today."

"It was nothing, I would have done it any other time...and also I'm sure you would have done the same for me."

"Ye-yeah," Six stammered out, he wasn't used to talking this much. Both SPARTANS let out a blush at each other. "Well I guess I have to get back to my bunk now," he began to turn around.

"Hey Six, why don't you lay in bed with me for a bit?" Kat invited. "Ok" he readily replied back, letting out some his obvious interest. Kat's bed was quite snug, it was after all, only designed for one SPARTAN to sleep on, not two plus an Elite. Their two bodies rubbed one another in the small space, with Six getting more acquainted to Kat's belly than he ever had before. The two felt up each other's skin and took in their body odor. Their hormones started racing for more interaction. The rubbing eventually became groping and then finally grinding.

Both became exhausted and eventually fell asleep in each other's loving arms.

choices: Kat and Six go on another mission together

15512111.content:
By next morning, the pair of SPARTANS were still holding each other in a tight loving embrace. Kat was the first to awaken, immediately she noted the lack of a heavy belly attached to her; the Elite had been kind enough to allow itself to be completely dissolve overnight. She laid awake in bed for a few minutes longer, Six's breathing being her only source of company. While SPARTAN-B312 was new to Noble Team, Kat felt an intense physical attraction to the male SPARTAN, evident obviously in last night's love making session.

Kat sat up in bed to inspect some of the changes to her body after digesting the Elite, her breasts had notably swelled up several cup sizes, leaving her with an impressive H-cup. The growth of her breasts had also managed to snap her two sizes too small tank top. Kat groped her new assets, getting accustomed to their new dimensions and weight. Her movement in bed stirred Noble Six to waking. "Morning sleepyhead," Kat said to her still groggy lover. "Fun night last night?"

Six instantly perked up at being reminded of what they did, "I'll say. And it looks like you're back to your usual shape I see."

Kat gave an uncharacteristic giggle. "Somewhat, but I also have some new shapes," she leaned over to him, giving him the best possible view of her greatly enlarged breasts. Noble Six brushed his head up against Kat's soft chest, like a pet cat cuddling up to its owner.

She looked over her shoulder and saw Six hugging her butt; her breasts weren't the only thing to grow, her ass cheeks had expanded like huge beach balls. Her gray panties clung tightly around her wide hips and swollen cheeks, but the reduced area gave Six a better view of private parts. Kat thought Six really was like a lost puppy looking for an owner. She gave Six a long kiss on the lips to see if that would settle the lover boy down. "We can have round 2 tonight Six, but right now we really need to get suited up."

Since when were you almost as tall as Jorge?" Kat looked around the room to compare and he was right, she had grown in height. The formerly 6'9 woman was now closer 7'4, she was going to need all new armor, not just a repair like they thought yesterday. Maybe combat was going to become more interesting for a bigger Kat? But one thing was definitely for sure: sex with Six was going to be a whole new experience.

Kat and Six walked over to the armory to get suited up, with Kat resting her arm over Six's shorter shoulders and bringing his head close to her bosom. They both enjoyed this level of closeness in each other's company.
15512111.title: The Next Morning

155121111.content:
After Kat and Six suited up, Kat had to have an up-scaled robotic arm attached, as her old one was too small now, just like the rest of her armor; they met in Command HQ getting briefed for their next missions. "Kat you'll be heading to an orphanage in New Alexandria that has been cut off the Covenant. The Covies' AA guns prevent us from landing an air evac to save the children, and there's too much infantry on the ground to send in marines, So that's why we're sending a SPARTAN in to take care of the job, you are those kids' only hope SPARTAN. Do us proud." Sword Base's commander ordered.

Kat nodded, "Can do sir." Six fidget a little, "Permission to join SPARTAN-B320 on this mission, sir."

"The Lone Wolf wants to join the pack for a change? This isn't normally like you Noble Six, but... on consideration of the consequences of this mission, I'll allow it. Your Falcon is waiting to take you there now."

On the Falcon flight to the LZ, Kat and Six were staring intently at each other, "You couldn't stand the thought of spending another minute without my company, huh Six?" Kat teased. Six simply shook his head. "That's alright, I prefer this arrangement myself. I think we make a good team."

When they reached the landing zone, the Commander wasn't lying about the amount of infantry, as the LZ was quite hot. The Falcon pilot didn't bother landing the helicopter, the two SPARTANS jumped from ten feet in the air right into a firefight. The two took cover on some nearby crates, the enemies in area was pretty standard, mostly Grunts, Jackals, and a couple Elites directing those beneath them. Kat took a few head shots on Grunts when she could find them; Six was alternating between a machine gun and a DMR, using the machine gun to break the Elites' shields while using the DMR to inflict the critical damage to heads and vitals. The two skilled soldiers made quick work of the landing area, before moving on to deeper parts of the city.

They found the orphanage at the coordinates they were given, but when they reached it, they found it under siege by more Covenant. At the entrance of the building were the very last guards protecting the building, they were firing in vain at the invading aliens, but a green explosions rips around them, incinerating their bodies. This time they were assisted by Hunters armed with heavy plasma cannons. This would complicate things. Their strategy was much the same as before, picking off the weakest members of the Covenant while working their way up to the stronger opponents. When fighting the Elites, Six provided a distraction, goading one around a corner, where a waiting Kat was hiding. Using her enhanced strength from her bigger body, she had an easy time beating the Sangheili into submission, AKA punching his face so hard his neck broke. "That's some power," Six remarked. Kat only snickered in response.

With all of the Elites finished, they turned their attention back to the Hunters, whose shots they had been dodging the whole fight. Six picked up a nearby rocket launcher, too bad there was only one shot left in it, it wouldn't be lethal, but he could at least soften up one of the Hunters. Kat, on the other hand found a shotgun, while she prefers pistols, she knew when times arose when that wasn't going to be enough. Six let off his rocket, it hit the closest Hunter to him. The Hunter in turn, absorbed the blast, albeit with damaged armor. Kat made her move behind the worm beast and shot off a spray of pellets into its back, harming it even further. Six took the opportunity to throw a sticky grenade on its exposed back, finishing it off. The other Hunter became enraged upon seeing its brother be killed, it ran forward, swinging its mighty arm at Six. Six was turned around, trying to escape the Hunter's swing, he was too slow to turn, but Kat rushed forth and tackled Six out of range of the swipe. Kat excited the tackle with a somersault, with her shotgun aimed at the Hunter's exposed face. She let pulled the trigger, releasing the shell into the beast's face. It didn't die of course, but it was injured. Kat dodged another of the Hunter's swipe, this time jumping behind it. She let off a few more shots, this time killing the beast. By this time Six recovered and was back on his feet. The Covenant in this area were defeated, for now. "Come on let's head inside," Kat told Six, who followed her in.

Past the front doors were bloody bodies littered about everywhere, there was no one to greet them. A few seconds in, the two SPARTANS could hear weeping from deeper inside the orphanage. Six and Kat searched for source of the sobs, finding them louder near the basement entrance. When they opened the door, they heard the voices of children. "Is it safe yet?" "Where's Melissa?" "Who are you?"

The two soldiers were overwhelmed by the questions asked, Kat took charge as Six wasn't much of a communicator, she took her helmet off to appear more human and comforting to the obviously scared kids. "Children please calm. We're here to rescue you from the aliens. Can you tell me where the adults are that are watching you?" One of the older kids, a ten year old girl spoke up, "They were all upstairs keeping watch and protecting us. Melissa worked here and was our main caretaker, did you see her?" The SPARTANS looked at each other grimly, remembering seeing the corpse of a woman in hallways with a name tag that read Melissa. "I'm sure she's fine, and we'll look for her once we get you kids secured. I'll call in an air evac and get you all out of here to safety."

"Noble Actual, this is Noble Two, I need a Pelican here to evac these children."

"Negative Noble Two, there is still too much AA in your area to send in an evac."

"WHAT?! These kids will die out here if you don't evacuate them."

"There's nothing else we can do, we're stretched thin enough as it is and we can't risk losing more. I'm sorry, you'll have to find your own transport."

Kat looked to Six, "There's no evac coming, we're on our own."

"What are we going to do?" the male SPARTAN asked.

"Try to find a working vehicle, any vehicle. We'll take ten minutes and come back here." Ten minutes comes and goes, unfortunately they couldn't find an armored vehicle, but Six did find a transport Warthog, but it would leave the children exposed without protection. "The children won't be safe in this thing, do you have any ideas to shield them?" Six asked.

Kat was forced to get creative again. Things were getting pretty drastic, they no protection, no armor, for these kids. Then Kat got an idea, she had armor, if she brought the kids inside of her suit, her MJOLNIR armor could protect all of them, but how was she going to bring them in? Kat decided to...
155121111.title: Save the Children

choices: Search for noble six and digest the children
Leave and hope noble six will make it own his own
1551211111.content:
Kat looked at the children again before making her choice. She had put her helmet on a nearby bench "Six,I nee to talk to you for a sec" "uhh... sure what is it"he asked
"We don't have many options except for that warthog and I can fit all the chil..." "Don't tell me you want to" "Listen six we don't many other options"kat said with a determined tone "Fine but these are kids so be gentle" "I will" six stood aside and watched as kat went over to the kids "Alright I have a plan but no promises that you'll like it I'm going to eat you all but it's only to get you to saftey once we're safe i)l let you out" all the kids stares at kat like she was dumb but soon they started to agree with her plan mainly because anything was better then being here where the covenant could get them Kat grabbed a kid with glasses by the shoulders and pulled his head into her mouth six watched as her stomach grew bigger after fully swallowing a kid he watched in about 50% shock that she could do that and about 50% attracted to her motions. It didn't take long before she had all kids in her stomach
"Six,you ready" he nodded they headed out the basement to an old orange Corp warthog six took the wheel and kat sat next to him with her stomach against the dashboard. Six drove off and started heading back to base "Noble actual this is Noble 2 we got the kids and are returning to base" "copy that Noble 2 good job Noble actual out" it was a long hour of nothing but driving but then came a covenant stronghold a blast from a hunter quickly tipped the warthog making six fly out the front window and kat laying on her back beside the warthog Six was nowhere to be seen and kat didnt have much time to waste or she would end up digesting the children so she had tough decision to make.
1551211111.title: eat all of the children

choices: Split up and have them sleep on their own
15512111111.content:
Quick author note: the choice was meant to say RISK digestion the children

Kat quickly got to her feet and reached for her trusty pistol to realize it wasn't there she looked around before spotting a plasma pistol from a grunt that died in the explosion of the warthog. Looking around for six one more time before seeing what had taken out the warthog there were two elites one hunter and about 12 jackals with about 30 grunts while focusing on the enemy count she saw something moving closer toward her she looked over to see six limping his way over to the warthog thankfully none of the covenant had seen him by time six got to the warthog he crouched beside it "Hey you alright Six" with a sound if concern in her voice "Y-yeah I'm fine but more importantly are the kids?" Kat had almost forgot the children "O-oh yeah there fine but we have to get to base soon I dont think I can hold them much longer I can feel their movements getting weaker" "ok then we need to hurry but we're going to have to walk" "alright let's stop talking and get moving" the of then started walking still remaining undetected about an 30 min walk there reached base "Noble 2 to Noble actual were back open the doors Noble 2 out" "Command confirm Noble 2" by time they got in the base Kat was already helmetless throwing the kids back up all except one "why isn't he coming out" "he died he was in there to long" there was a small bulge in her stomach she was digesting the kid with glasses the first kid she ate her stomach was fast at work digesting the kid
"Well at least mist if you made it" at this point it was late at night once again so six what will it be
15512111111.title: Search for noble six and digest the children

choices: They drive straight to the base
1551211112.content:
Kat looked back to the children, "I know this is going to sound pretty crazy, but honestly pretty desperate here. You kids need protection while we drive out of here, and this is our only option. I'm going to unbirth you all, and bring you into my womb, you'll be safe in there, under all of my armor." The children were all confused by her request and didn't move, "We have to move now!," Kat started undoing her armor around her waist, freeing the skin around her pelvis and thighs. She laid down on her back, spreading her legs wide to accept her first passenger

The first group to go in were the toddlers who could walk, they could get assistance from Six outside, helping them in, while Kat's vaginal muscles did most of the work inside. Six hustled the children in as gently as possible, as they were on a strict time schedule before Covenant reinforcements arrived. The first child in immediately curled up, leaving an obvious bulge in Kat's midsection outside. The young toddlers fought with Six, not understanding why they were being pushed back into the womb, but they were going to be the biggest hassle, and that's why they were chosen to go first.

The toddler group finished at only four. The next up were the older kids, their ages ranging from five to eleven, there were eight of them in total. They were harder in some ways than the toddlers, harder for Kat that is, to get them inside, their larger bodies proved more of a challenge to get inside the vaginal lips. "HNNNNNGG," Kat grunted a heavy breath as the ten year old girl entered inside her. "How are you holding up Kat?" Six inquired. "Alright all things considered, I've fit larger things in my stomach before, surely I can fit fifteen children in my womb." Six was gripping Kat's hand while soothingly massaging her increasingly bulging midsection, the black under suit of her armor, becoming more and more stretched as each child entered.

The last were the group, were the three infants. They wanted to do the infants last to ensure that the older kids inside would be able to receive them and find a safe place for the babies inside. Six looked down at the infant in his arms, prepared to push it up Kat's cooch. He thought its sleeping form was one of the most beautiful sights on Reach, and while he was a career soldier, he wouldn't mind having a child of his own after the war blew over. Kat looked at Six peering down at the infant, "Six...come on," she urged him. "Right," he continued on with their plan, placing the baby's legs into Kat's vagina, a combination of gently pushing from Six and pulling from one of the children in the womb brought the infant's full body inside of Kat. They repeated the process for the other two babies.

Once all the children were safely tucked in Kat's womb, the female SPARTAN was extremely stuffed. Her womb was fuller with fifteen children inside than her stomach was with one Elite she ate the other day. Her belly was so large, Kat couldn't get up on her own, Six lent her a hand and puller her to her feet. Her black skin suit covered her entire body and ensured that none of Kat or the children would be exposed to enemy fire. Six asked "So how does it feel?" while rubbing the stretched skin suit outside.

"Heavy, but... comforting, like I'm a mama to all of these kids." Inside of her womb, amniotic fluid had filled up and umbilical cords attached to all of her passengers. Hormones flooded her bloodstream as her body quickly identified itself as being pregnant. Kat's already expanded breasts distended even further in size as milk production started booming like mad. "...and now I'm really pregnant." Both SPARTANS were surprised at the speed at which Kat's milky breasts enlarged themselves. Six thought Kat was the most beautiful woman he had ever laid eyes on, she basked in a divine maternal glow, that only being pregnant with a giant belly could bring. She was already en exemplary woman, being incredibly tall and busty, not to mention a total badass, and pretty smart too, being pregnant was just like a cherry on top of an already awesome sundae.

A loud explosion outside reminded the two of the pressing matter of escape. They ran over to the parked Warthog outside. Kat needed help getting her belly into the vehicle, a task which Six was all too happy to assist her with. Once situated, Kat had a detached mounted machine gun, which she could use to fend off approaching Covies. Six took to the wheel and floored the vehicle, intent on escaping New Alexandria with everyone on board alive.
1551211112.title: Maternal Kat

Female Spartans

IIs or IIIs

Members of Blue Team

1551321.title: IIs

155232.content: You are huge hunter patrolling an area on the planet Reach. You have been here for over 8 hours and haven't eaten anything and nothing has happened yet. You have thought about eating those birds that run around but they were to fast for you. A few more minutes pass before you see a human jeep driving over the hill infringement of you. You look closely at the person in it and it seems to be...
155232.title: Hunger Hunter

155232111.content: You see the blue women driving straight for you but you simply plant your shield in the ground and flip the car. You walk beside and reach your arm inside and grab the human. She is dazed but still awake and starts to punch your arm but is not effective. You smile at her and lick your lips wanting her as good. Should you keep her armor on or take it off?
155232111.title: Kat Lunch

1552321112.content: You decide to keep her amour on, it's more delicious and they last longer in your belly. You lift the blue Spartan in the the air, above your now open maw. She starts to panic more now that she knows what is happening. You drop the Spartan into your mouth and close it once she lands inside. You swish the small Spartan inside your mouth for a while before starting to swallow her down. She try's to stop herself from falling down your throat but you are to strong and gulp her down into her new home. Your belly bulges a little as it fills with the human Spartan. You pat your belly and ponder on what to do next.
1552321112.title: Shell is the best part

155233.content: So you're an Ungoyy. But are you a Predator or Prey?
155233.title: Grunt

info.brief_description: Characters in the Halo series are hungry but for who?
info.description: Welcome to the Halo series with a little twist. Become a Pred or a prey for anyone in the Halo series. Be Master Chief and become a meal for The Arbiter. This story contains vore, digestion, scat, and death. All types of vore allowed along with some dirty stuff but only M|F, no M|M or F|F.
